<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2273</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A repository of Learning objects in Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Behälter der erlernennachrichten in der 
Wissenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un dépôt des objets d'étude en la Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um repositório de objetos de aprendizagem na 
ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un deposito degli oggetti imparanti nella scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια αποθήκη της εκμάθησης των αντικειμένων στην 
επιστήμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un depósito de objetos que aprenden en ciencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A repository of learning objects in the sciences including fromt he flields of life and earth sciences, chemistry and physiology</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Behälter des Lernens wendet in den 
Wissenschaften einschließlich fromt ihn flields des Lebens und der 
Geowissenschaften, der Chemie und der Physiologie ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un dépôt de l'étude l'objecte en sciences 
comprenant le fromt des flields de la vie et des sciences de la terre,
chimie et physiologie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um repositório da aprendizagem objeta-o nas 
ciências including o fromt flields de ciências da vida e de terra, 
de chemistry e de physiology</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un deposito di imparare lo obietta nelle scienze 
compreso fromt flields di vita e le scienze della terra, chimica e la 
fisiologia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια αποθήκη της εκμάθησης αντιτίθεται στις επιστήμες 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου fromt του flields των επιστημών ζωής και 
γης, της χημείας και της φυσιολογίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un depósito de aprender se opone en las ciencias 
incluyendo fromt lo los flields de la vida y las geologías, química 
y fisiología</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geowissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
